gamePricing.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Official Pricing
gamePricing.description: Official pricing information across platforms (some platforms not yet priced)

questions.question: Why do some platforms show 'Not Priced'?
questions.answer: Currently, Hollow Knight: Silksong has only officially announced pricing on Steam. Pricing information for other platforms will be updated promptly once officially announced.

questions.question: How often is pricing information updated?
questions.answer: We closely monitor official store pages across all platforms and will immediately update this page once new pricing information is announced.

questions.question: Why do prices differ across regions?
questions.answer: Game pricing is adjusted based on factors like regional living costs, currency exchange rates, and market competition, which is a common practice in the gaming industry.
